CustomField.description: Can be used in scheduled flow to filter for the correct opps but cannot be used in record-triggered flows as ISCHANGED. RO-1461, RO - 1838
CustomField.formula: IF( HeyPaket_End_Date__c = TODAY(), "End Date Today", IF( HeyPaket_End_Date__c = TODAY() + 25, "End Date 25D in Future", IF( HeyPaket_End_Date__c = TODAY() + 56, "End Date 2Months in Future", IF( HeyPaket_End_Date__c = TODAY() + 1 && ISPICKVAL(HeyPaket_Status__c, "Renewed") && ISBLANK( Account.Next_HeyPaket__c ) , "Auto Renewal", "" ))))
CustomField.label: HeyPaket Date Triggers
